    • Uses of Action in game

      Subclasses of Action in game 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AimingAction
      A class which represents action to aim at a target.
      class  AttackAction
      Special Action for attacking other Actors.
      class  ChantingAction
      Represents the chanting action of priestess, Mambo Marie.
      class  CraftWeaponAction
      A class which represents action for crafting zombie arm or leg into club or mace.
      class  EatingAction
      A class which represents an action to eat food.
      class  FertiliseAction
      Special class for FertiliseAction so that the Farmer can fertilise an unripe crop and shorten the time needed for crop to ripe.
      class  GrowlAction
      Special action for Zombie to growl, i.e.
      class  HarvestAction
      Special action for Farmer and Player to harvest ripe crops.
      class  HumanAttackAction
      Special class which represents action taken by alive actors (Human/Player) to attack undead actor or priestess (Zombie/Mambo Marie).
      class  QuitGameAction
      Special class for Player to quit the game voluntarily.
      class  RefillBulletAction
      A class which represents an action to refill bullets of a weapon.
      class  ShootingAction
      A class which represents shooting action which allows player to choose shooting direction from a sub menu and results in area effect damage to more than one target based on specific miss chance.
      class  SnippingAction
      A class which represents sniping action which perform attack to specific target using specific miss chance and damage.
      class  SowingAction
      Special class for the Farmer to sow a crop.
      class  TravelAction
      Represents the Player’s action to travel between the compound map and town map.
      class  UseSniperAction
      A class which represents action for an actor to use a sniper rifle, by providing a sub menu for actor to choose a target from the actor's current map and after choosing a target, provide another sub menu for actor to choose action to perform on the target, either aiming at target or shoot at target.
      class  ZombieAttackAction
      Special class which represents action taken by undead actor or priestess (Zombie/Mambo Marie) to attack alive actors (Human/Player) .
      Methods in game that return Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Action WanderBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a MoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.
      Action SowingBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an action that allows the Farmer to sow a crop when he is standing next to a Dirt.
      Action PickUpItemBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a PickUpItemAction to pick up a weapon, if there is weapon at the actor's location.
      Action HuntBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map) 
      Action HarvestBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an action that allows the actor (Farmer/Player) to harvest a ripe crop when he is standing on or next to a ripe crop.
      Action GrowlBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an action that allows Zombie to growl, i.e.
      Action FollowBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map) 
      Action FertiliseBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an action that allows the Farmer to fertilise when he is standing on an unripe crop.
      Action EatingBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an EatingAction if the current Actor has hit point of value less than half of his maximum hit points and is standing in a location which has a food, else return null.
      Action Behaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      A factory for creating actions.
      Action AttackBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an AttackAction that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor.
      Action ZombieActor.playTurn(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Return an action which can be performed by the actor in the actor's current turn.
      Action Zombie.playTurn(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Check if zombie is in slow motion (left one leg) and return an action which can be performed by the zombie in its current turn.
      Action Priestess.playTurn(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Overload the playTurn method in parent class (ZombieActor) because priestess needs to carry out specific action during specific turn, i.e.
      Action Player.playTurn(Actions actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn.
      Methods in game that return types with arguments of type Action 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Action> Vehicle.getAllowableActions()
      Getter for a list of actions that a Player can do with using vehicle.
      java.util.List<Action> SniperRifle.getAllowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Return a list consisting of UseSniperAction only if the actor is Player, has the sniperRifle which still has bullet in his inventory and is not aiming at a target.
      java.util.List<Action> Shotgun.getAllowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Return a list consisting of ShootingAction only if the actor is Player and has the shotgun which still has bullet in his inventory.
      java.util.List<Action> LongRangedWeapon.getAllowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      If the Player has a shotgun without bullet in his inventory and has at least one ammunition in his inventory, return a list consisting of RefillBulletAction.
      java.util.List<Action> Limb.getAllowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Return a list consisting of CraftWeaponAction only if the actor is Player and has the limb in his inventory.
      java.util.List<Action> Food.getAllowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Return a list consisting of EatingAction only if the actor is Player and has the food in his inventory.
